modName: CBBEv3 Vanilla Clothing Replacer bodyslide compatible
summary: A mod to replace all clothing within the game with some sexier variants. Similar in concept to maks armor set. Currently a work in progress. A portion has been replaced and additional bodyslide sliders coming soon.
descriptionHtml:
The body is based on a smaller variant of CBBE I created in body slide. The bodyslide compatibility will allow anyone to change the mesh to suit there own desired body. As of now it is in the Beta stages and will be updated, hopefully, on a regular basis, no guarantees. Right now there are 2 sliders for each item, more to come as I update. I have been overly busy with staying alive. I will be getting back to this at some point soon.

Currently Replaced
Barkeeper Clothes
Beggars Clothes
Blacksmith\'s Apron
Chef\'s Tunic
Farm Clothes 2
Farm Clothes 3
Farm Clothes 4
Merchant Clothes
Miner Clothes
Tavern Clothes

Still to be done:
1st Person mesh changes
Farm Clothes 1
Yarl Clothes 1
Yarl Clothes 2
Yarl Clothes 3
Fine Clothes 1
Fine Clothes 2
Wedding Dress

Required Mods:
CBBE V3 Caliente\'s Big Bottom Edition (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666)

Updates:
Next Version(ETA 8-15-13:
Add Yarl Clothes and Farm Clothes 1
Fixes for clipping with certain bodyslide settings(noticed problems with certain settings for both breast and butt, will fix this before adding additional sliders.)

Further down the line
Wedding Dress
1st person meshes
Optional Files for less skimpy clothes ie skirts etc.
Additional Sliders in bodyslide

V0.6 Beta
Initial Upload

Thanks to:
Caliente for the mod which this is based on.
Mak07 for his armor mod. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004)
ChronoTrigger77 for giving me this idea. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259)
Nightasy for his tutorials
author: crater86
